mission.posting: Find Ph4nt4sm and invite her to the crew.

email.subject: Port Issues
email.body:
I've checked the IP you sent me. That system's got us on the right track! It seems she's improved her botnet too...
Port 554 is locked? No problem; I performed some research into a cracking tool that we could use to get through the port and into Ph4nt4sm's system.
Hear me out, this shady looking group of hackers collaborated on a project called RTSPSmasher. I'll provide you a link to one of their machines, however do be careful. They're very likely not to store such a valuable project on one of their regular systems, my guess is you'll have to root around for it.
I know I don't have to tell you of all people this, but be careful. These guys aren't amateurs so remember to take your time and be methodical.
Reply back to when you're into Ph4nt4sm's botnet server.
